response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $12,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $10,000. This price reflects its exceptional value while allowing us to maintain a fair profit margin. I hope we can come to an agreement that satisfies both parties. Please let me know your thoughts on this offer.", "product_price": 10000}
